author: ramilexe
content: Hi <@!552133098075193354> yes, we setup our node and it synced with testnet.

author: timbeiko
content: Oh nice! It may be worth adding you as a validator to it as well, and re-running the transaction generation script that <@!574864862338088960> has to make sure everything works properly. It's Friday evening Europe for him, but he can send you the instructions next week üëç

author: timbeiko
content: Also, we agreed on AllCoreDevs that 2718 is making it into Berlin üéâ I think on the next implementers call we can discuss when we want to do that change to the spec. My personal preference would be to get a large-scale testnet working with the current version (Abdel is working on it and I think we'll have it ready by the call next week), and then update the spec to add 2718 support.

author: timbeiko
content: Abdel will send over the instructions monday, but I think he needs your node key or ID üëç
